page.title: 02Life on a Holwell Farm
page.content: Mr & Mrs D. own 50 acres and employ no labour. They have l6 cows, several calves, 30 pigs, 40 hens and 6 cats. {5.30 am}Get up for milking; clean out overnight bedding; feed cows, calves, pigs, hens and cats. {8.30 am}Breakfast. Wash machine and buckets. Turn cows into yard and clean out cowstall. Bring in hay, cow cake, sugar beet. Clean out pigs and calves. Sweep and clean yard, remove manure by tractor. {12.30 pm}Lunch. Clean up house, make butter, gardening. {3.30 pm}Milk cows, clean out and feed all livestock, wash machines. {6.00 pm}Tea. Mr D writing. Mrs D ironing, mending, washing eggs etc. {10.00 pm}Mr D out to clean up cowstall and look at all animals. {11.00 pm}Bed.
